## Welcome!

I am a fourth-year undergraduate student at UCLA double-majoring in Math/Econ and Stats&Data Science. My research interests are in Statistical Machine Learning, Financial Mathematics, and Networks. I'm grateful to be mentored by [Dr. Mason Porter](https://www.math.ucla.edu/~mason/) and [Dr. Jerry Luo](https://jerryluo8.github.io/). My project is on `Microfinance Diffusion` and `Opinion Dynamics`.

Click here to view a selection of [my projects](Projects.qmd).
